TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HostSecurityPolicyResolver extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供方式來自訂 ASP.NET 執行階段行為以覆寫 ASP.NET 程式碼存取安全性原則。

span.span: Provides a way to customize ASP.NET behavior at run time that overrides the ASP.NET code access security policy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在複雜的 Web 裝載環境，例如 SharePoint 和 Web 伺服器陣列中，您可能必須擴充 ASP.NET 程式碼存取安全性原則。In complex Web hosting environments such as SharePoint and Web farms, you might have to extend the ASP.NET code access security policy. 藉由擴充類型，您可以實作自訂安全性原則的行為會覆寫 ASP.NET 程式碼存取安全性原則。By extending the type, you can implement custom security policy behavior that overrides the ASP.NET code access security policy. ## 設定 HostSecurityPolicyResolver 類別Configuring a HostSecurityPolicyResolver Class 在組態檔中，您可以設定自訂藉由新增執行個體屬性的項目。In the configuration files, you can configure a custom instance by adding the attribute to the element. 屬性可以設定的自訂名稱會由 ASP.NET 載入的型別。The attribute can be set to the name of the custom type that will be loaded by ASP.NET. 屬性值包含之衍生型別的完整的名稱。The attribute value contains the fully qualified name of the derived type. 根據預設，[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]未設定這個屬性。By default, [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] does not set this attribute. 下列語法會示範如何設定屬性：The following syntax shows how to configure the attribute: ``` ``` 屬性`trust`元素可以設定為字串值，指出應該用在部分信任的組態檔中設定的具名使用權限。The attribute in the `trust` element can be set to a string value that indicates which named permission set in a partial trust configuration file should be used. 根據預設，ASP.NET 4 會設定此屬性為"ASP.Net"。By default, ASP.NET 4 sets this attribute to "ASP.Net". 屬性`trust`元素會指出自訂會由 ASP.NET 載入的物件。The attribute in the `trust` element indicates the custom object that will be loaded by ASP.NET. 如果屬性設定為空字串時，應用程式會使用 ASP.NET 的預設邏輯來判斷組件的權限。If the attribute is set to an empty string, the application uses the ASP.NET default logic for determining the permissions for the assembly. 類型屬性不可設為 null 值。The type attribute cannot be set to a null value. > [!IMPORTANT] > 組件，其中包含衍生型別必須執行以完全信任，因為自訂型別提供 ASP.NET 可用來提升為完全信任組件的資訊。The assembly that contains a derived type must run with full trust, because the custom type provides information that ASP.NET can use to elevate assemblies to full trust. 一般情況下，您應該部署在全域組件快取，其中會以完全信任中執行的自訂原則解析程式類型。In general, you should deploy a custom policy resolver type in the global assembly cache, where it will run with full trust. 當您實作這個類別時，您必須覆寫方法。When you implement this class, you must override the method. 取決於這個執行個體是做為參數傳遞，方法會傳回列舉值，指出要套用至組件的安全性原則。Depending on the instance that is passed as a parameter, the method returns an enumeration value that indicates the security policy to apply to the assembly. 一組可用的安全性原則由列舉型別。The set of available security policies is determined by the enumeration.

exception.span: 屬性具有無效值，或找不到。

span.span: The attribute has an invalid value or cannot be found.

permission.span: 針對繼承類型的完全信任。

span.span: for full trust for the inheriting type.

permission.span: 這個類別無法被繼承，部分信任程式碼。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Web.Hosting.HostSecurityPolicyResults ResolvePolicy(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

param.name: evidence
param.span: 關於組件及主應用程式之辨識項的集合，可用來做為安全性原則的輸入。

span.span: A collection of evidence about an assembly and a host, which is used as an input to security policy.

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示應該套用至組件的安全性原則。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the security policy that should be applied to an assembly.

returns.span: 表示應該套用至組件之安全性權限類型的值。

span.span: A value that indicates the type of security permissions should be applied to an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您繼承自類別時，您必須實作方法。If you inherit from the class, you must implement the method. 根據所提供的資訊`evidence`參數，這個方法應傳回中所定義的安全性原則的其中一個列舉型別。Based on the information that is provided in the `evidence` parameter, the method should return one of the security policies that are defined in the enumeration.
